attributes.action: Politicians - STOP wasting time and START getting the UK back-on-track
attributes.additional_details:
It's time for Politicians to STOP wasting valuable and precious TIME through scoring petty points against each other and START working together to stimulate the ECONOMY and get the United Kingdom back-on-track to create more EMPLOYMENT and reduce our deficit burden.

A good place to start is the farce that Prime Minister's Question Time has become, as well as many other Parliamentary debates.

We DON'T have time for this childish behaviour anymore!
